synopsis.text: Kotarou Azumi, a budding author, and Akane Mizuno, a passionate track athlete, find themselves in the same third-year middle school class for the first time. As they navigate their final year of junior high, they are tasked with managing the sports festival equipment, leading to a blossoming connection through their shared experiences and frequent LINE conversations. As Kotarou grapples with his burgeoning feelings for Akane, he discovers that love is not always simple. Meanwhile, Takumi, who has held a flame for Akane since their first year, and Chinatsu, Akane's friend with a growing interest in Kotarou, add complexity to the young couple's journey. Set in Kawagoe, this heartwarming tale explores the trials and triumphs of adolescent love, growth, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
